description: Gen Z is turning to investment apps like Zerodha for financial independence. With a focus on compounding and SIPs, the youth navigates market volatility cautiously, influenced by 'finfluencers' on social media.
title: Gen Zs take insta liking to stock market reels

description: Dooars faces climate change impacts on tea estates, with Gorkha community seeking Gorkhaland. Political contests intensify in LS seats. Mamata's initiatives lead to conflicts over land ownership. PM Modi urges patience for a lasting solution in Siliguri meeting.
title: LS polls: No easy pickings in Bengal’s tea junction

description: Skymet forecasts 'normal' monsoon with 102% rainfall. IMD to release forecast. Early signs of favourable monsoon. Jatin Singh expects good rains in specific regions. Certain areas face deficit rainfall risk. Remnant El Nino effects may impact the start, but second half has an advantage.
title: Monsoon likely to be 'normal' this year, says private forecaster

description: Arizona's highest court upholds 1864 abortion ban, impacting women's healthcare and state politics. Ruling criticized by abortion-rights supporters. Doctors could face penalties. No exceptions for life of the mother, rape, or incest.
title: Arizona top court revives 1864 law that bans nearly all abortions

description: Retail investors surged on Dalal Street, with 15 crore demat accounts. Mutual fund folios reached 11 crore, while equity assets grew. SIPs rose to Rs 19,000 crore amidst foreign fund selloffs, supported by financialisation of savings and digitisation.
title: Hungry for returns, investors SIP on stocks

description: Buta Singh Gill, president of a construction firm, shot dead by Indian gangsters with pro-Khalistan ties in Edmonton. The incident is part of a series of extortions targeting Indian-origin individuals in Canada, linked to a criminal network in India.
title: Gurdwara prez shot dead in Canada; Indian gangsters' role suspected

description: In Nashik, a tragic incident unfolded as a Maharashtra family jumped into an abandoned well to save a cat. Despite a rescue effort by villagers, only one member survived and was hospitalized in Ahmednagar.
title: 5 of family feared drowned while trying to save cat from well

description: DGCA addresses Air India incidents by emphasizing zero tolerance for unruly behavior, handling intoxicated passengers as per Civil Aviation Requirements, and focusing on settling disputes and reporting disruptive incidents to the police.
title: It's for airlines to decide how much alcohol to serve: DGCA

description: MVA urges EC to cancel Mungantiwar's candidature for remarks against Congress in Chandrapur. Fadnavis and Shinde present. Women's wing stages demonstrations. Tiwari seeks Fadnavis's intervention.
title: Maharashtra minister sparks row with 'incest' slur on Congress

description: KCYM plans to screen 'The Kerala Story', sparking political concerns. BJP engages with Christians over 'love jihad'. BJP criticizes CM Vijayan. Movie criticized for tarnishing Kerala's image and Muslim community. Thalassery archdiocese distances from the screening plan.
title: Extra screen time for 'Kerala Story' stirs UDF, LDF concern

description: Muthuvallur, a small village in Kerala's Muslim-majority district of Malappuram, has written a heartwarming story of communal harmony over the renovation of a 400-year-old Durga temple, reaffirming a centuries-long tradition of Hindu-Muslim generosity centered on places of worship during Ramzan.
title: Hindus, Muslims unite for renovation of 400-year-old Durga temple in Kerala

description: Twelve lives lost, many injured in a bus accident near a mine pit in Durg, Chhattisgarh. Rescue operations ongoing as senior officials oversee. President and PM express grief, victims include workers from a private company.
title: At least 12 dead, 14 injured in Chhattisgarh bus accident

description: The National Investigation Agency charged Gautam Navlakha ₹1.64 crore for house arrest in the Elgar Parishad case. The Supreme Court ruled on Tuesday that Navlakha must pay the amount and gave him one week to decide how to reimburse the agency. The funds were spent to provide police personnel for his security during his home detention.
title: You asked, you pay: SC to Navlakha on Rs 1.6 crore security bill

description: Maha Vikas Aghadi settles Maharashtra LS seat-sharing. Congress concedes Sangli, Bhiwandi. Sena gets 21, Congress 17, NCP 10 seats. Uddhav Thackeray, Sharad Pawar present. AICC directs for 'INDIA's interest'. Thackeray declares candidates. Patole explains as 'not a surrender'.
title: UBT to contest 21 Maharashtra seats, Congress 17, NCP 10

description: The Supreme Court ruled on Tuesday that failing to disclose all assets owned by an electoral candidate does not constitute a defect, and that such assets must be of substantial value to invalidate an election, while also stating that the right of voters to know must be balanced with candidates' right to privacy.
title: Voters don't need to know every detail of a neta's assets: SC

description: CRPF to provide Z-category security nationwide to CEC Rajiv Kumar due to pro-Khalistan threats conveyed through pre-recorded calls. Security includes escort vehicle, 24/7 commando protection, and static security at residence and Nirvachan Sadan.
title: Z-category cover for CEC in view of threats from Khalistanis

description: The Delhi high court on Tuesday confirmed the legality of Kejriwal's arrest by the Enforcement Directorate in a money laundering case related to the alleged excise policy scheme. The HC ruled that the data acquired by ED demonstrated that he allegedly conspired and was actively involved in the use and concealment of criminal gains.
title: Kejriwal's arrest by ED valid, says HC, dismisses challenge

description: Fortune-teller arrested for parrot's prediction on Thankar Bachan. PMK criticizes as 'height of fascism'. Forest ranger cites Wildlife Act, legal penalties for captive parrots. Astrologer Selvaraj in headlines, DMK response by Anbumani Ramadoss.
title: Owner of parrot that 'predicted' poll result held

description: AK Antony criticises son Anil's BJP candidacy for Pathanamthitta LS seat, stating he should lose. Emphasizes separating family from politics, loyalty to Congress, and disapproval of children joining BJP. Anil criticizes Anto Antony for insulting the Army.
title: Congress's AK Antony wants son, a BJP candidate, to lose

description: The National Medical Commission (NMC) has approved the formation of 112 new medical colleges nationwide, bringing the total number to more than 800. Since 2013-14, the country's medical colleges have nearly doubled. The number of seats for an undergraduate course (MBBS) has also increased by almost 110%, from 51,348 in 2013-14 to 1,08,990 in 2023-24.
title: NMC gives nod to 112 new med colleges, UP to get 22, Delhi 1

description: The silence of major Muslim organizations and clerics in advising community members on voting preferences for the upcoming Lok Sabha polls indicates a strategic approach to avoid polarization and promote political maturity among the community.
title: Clerics steer clear of issuing appeals, wary of polarising majority vote

description: Rajnath Singh criticizes China renaming places in Arunachal Pradesh, emphasizing the futility of such actions. He praises border residents' support during the 1962 war, highlighting their enduring contributions.
title: Rajnath in Arunachal: What if we rename Chinese territories?

description: Raj Thackeray, the Maharashtra Navnirman Sena (MNS) president, has expressed his support for the BJP-led Mahayuti (Shiv Sena of CM Eknath Shinde and NCP of Ajit Pawar) in the forthcoming parliamentary election, citing "Narendra Modi" and the nation's growth. He added that this election would determine if "we are achieving growth or moving towards downfall".
title: Raj Thackeray declares support to Modi, was against them last election

description: Young Nitish Reddy showed tremendous character during a vital 37-ball 64 as Sunrisers Hyderabad eked out a two-run win over Punjab Kings, surviving a daring attempt by Shashank Singh and Ashutosh Sharma in a see-sawing IPL match in Mullanpur on Tuesday.
title: 26 runs leaked in final over but SRH still win

description: UN condemns civilian loss in Israel-Hamas conflict, crisis unacceptable. India's ambassador criticizes Hamas strikes. UNSC demanded Gaza ceasefire, hostages release. Russia, China veto US draft, triggering general assembly debate.
title: Gaza humanitarian crisis unacceptable: India at UN

description: Union government explained to the Supreme Court how the Constitution-framers intended to grant the Centre complete control over industries. This power was utilized by the Modi government during the Covid pandemic for oxygen and industrial alcohol diversions.
title: Law used in Covid also gives Centre control over industrial alcohol: SG

description: Supreme Court utilized Article 142 to dismiss criminal proceedings against a man under Section 498A of IPC, citing post-divorce harassment. The court quashed the FIR and subsequent proceedings to prevent prolonging differences between the separated couple.
title: Woman can't slap cruelty case on ex after divorce: Supreme Court

description: In a crucial IPL match on Tuesday, young Nitish Reddy displayed remarkable fortitude, crafting a pivotal 64 runs off just 37 balls for Sunrisers Hyderabad in a nail-biting encounter against Punjab Kings. Despite facing a daring onslaught from Shashank Singh and Ashutosh Sharma, SRH clinched a narrow two-run victory in a match filled with fluctuations.
title: IPL: SRH survive Shashank-Ashutosh scare to pip PBKS in a thriller

description: Congress criticized home minister Amit Shah for his recent remarks implying that China has not intruded upon any Indian territory during the Modi government's tenure. The party argued that by absolving China of any wrongdoing, the ruling party is complicating India's efforts to tackle the issue of unlawful encroachment. They stressed that the Congress manifesto acknowledges the danger posed by China's occupation of Indian land and presents a concrete strategy to strengthen the nation's defenses.
title: Cong hits out at Amit Shah for giving ‘clean chit’ to China

description: Jonty Rhodes' charisma and charm makes him a beloved cricketer globally and he serves as an enduring inspiration for cricketers and fans alike. However, Lucknow Super Giants fielding coach faced a backlash on social media for his post ridiculing a LSG fan.
title: Rhodes' 'get a life' reply to LSG fan leaves netizens fuming
MVA seat deal: Uddhav has last laugh; Cong says 'did not surrender'

description: Kremlin hints at Putin-Xi meeting, no timeframe. Lavrov in Beijing for Eurasian security. Russia-China counter US-led alliance, no Ukraine talks if Russian positions ignored. China essential for peace conference success.
title: Russia drops hint of possible Putin-Xi meeting

description: British physicist Peter Higgs, whose theory of a mass-giving particle the so-called Higgs boson -- jointly earned him the Nobel Prize for Physics, has died aged 94, the University of Edinburgh announced on Tuesday. "He passed away peacefully at home on Monday 8 April following a short illness," the Scottish university said in a statement, calling him "a great teacher and mentor, inspiring generations of young scientists".
title: Physicist Peter Higgs who discovered 'God Particle' dies at 94

description: Young Nitish Reddy showed tremendous character during a vital 37-ball 64, which lifted Sunrisers Hyderabad to a challenging 182/9 against Punjab Kings in their Indian Premier League match in Mullanpur on Tuesday.
title: IPL: Dhawan gives Head early lifeline but...
Cong releases list of candidates for Andhra polls

description: Airfares for domestic flights have risen by 20-25% due to Vistara flight cancellations and high demand.  Spot fares show significant increases on specific routes. Industry experts project a 20-25% surge in airfares for both domestic and international routes.
title: Airfares surge 20-25% amid Vistara cancellations

description: Election Commission issued a notification to Congress MP Randeep Singh Surjewala regarding his remarks deemed "sexist, vulgar, and uncivilized" directed towards BJP MP and candidate Hema Malini during campaigning in Haryana. Additionally, the Commission addressed Congress President Mallikarjun Kharge, highlighting persistent breaches by party members of the EC's April 1 advisory urging campaigners to abstain from actions and language that could disparage the dignity of women.
title: EC notice to Surjewala for remarks on Hema Malini

description: Trinamool Congress leaders ended a 24-hour protest at Mandir Marg police station after being detained for sit-in outside the Election Commission's office. Aam Aadmi Party leaders supported TMC at the police station.
title: TMC calls off 24-hour protest day after being detained

description: Eid-ul-Fitr, ending Ramadan, involves prayers, forgiveness seeking, Zakat al-Fitr donations, feasting on biryani, sheer khurma, kheer. Celebrated on April 10th or 11th, 2024. Messages convey blessings, Quran quotes inspire, and images capture the festivities.
title: Eid-ul-Fitr 2024: Best Eid Mubarak messages, quotes, wishes

description: Skymet, India's leading private weather forecasting company, announced on Tuesday its prediction of a 'normal' monsoon for this year. According to their forecast, the four-month rainy season is anticipated to witness rainfall at approximately 102% of the long-period average (LPA), with a margin of error of +/- 5%. Rainfall ranging between 96-104% of the LPA is deemed normal, serving as a crucial parameter for successful farming operations in the country
title: Skymet predicts normal monsoon, deficit rainfall for eastern states

description: There's one often-overlooked avenue that inadvertently aids in tax-saving - the Employees' Provident Fund (EPF). If you are looking to opt for the old income tax regime, then be aware of the EPF benefits, returns, liquidity and other details.
title: EPF: Unintentional tax-saving investment for salaried - know tax benefits, returns

description: Former Pakistan team director Mohammad Hafeez posted a cryptic message on his social media platform, apparently aimed at the Pakistan Cricket Board, following their decision to recall fast bowler Mohammad Amir and left-arm spinner Imad Wasim.
title: 'RIP Pakistan domestic cricket': Hafeez

description: With less than a fortnight to go for the polls, Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Tuesday intensified the campaign trail for the BJP in Tamil Nadu. The Prime Minister, who is on his seventh visit to the state this year and the first after the 'Katchatheevu' issue was flagged by the BJP.
title: In Chennai, PM Modi adds weight to BJP’s poll push in TN

description: In Bollywood, daily stories range from family moments to relationship rumors and career updates. Amitabh and Abhishek Bachchan's birthday wishes to Jaya Bachchan, Ananya Panday's breakup speculation with Aditya Roy Kapur, Suchitra Krishnamoorthi's desire for Aryan and Kaveri in a film remake, Ankita Lokhande's role in 'Amrapali,' and Shekhar Suman's revelation about Kangana Ranaut and Adhyayan Suman's past relationship resonate in entertainment circles.
title: Relationship rumors & career updates: Top 5 entertainment news
Misleading ad case: Ramdev tenders unconditional apology

description: Scamsters deceive investors on WhatsApp using fake groups and false promises. They impersonate finance experts, run 'pump and dump' schemes, and trigger fear of missing out. Investors should verify affiliations and avoid suspicious requests.
title: How WA investing scams operate: Beware of these red flags

description: Union defence minister Rajnath Singh issued a firm warning to China over the renaming of places in Arunachal Pradesh. He reiterated India's readiness to retaliate if its dignity is compromised. Speaking at a public gathering in Namsai, Singh emphasized that altering names would not yield any significant outcomes. He highlighted that India would not lay claim to Chinese territories by renaming their provinces.
title: 'What if we change names...': Rajnath ridicules China's claims

description: Virat Kohli stood in the eye of a social media storm after making a 67-ball hundred for RCB against Rajasthan Royals in their IPL 2024 match at Jaipur, which was the joint slowest hundred in the competition alongside Manish Pandey's century in 2009.
title: 'Aur kisi ke naam se news nahi banti': Kohli's coach

description: The PM Surya Ghar Muft Bijli Yojana promotes solar energy usage by offering loans for panel installation. Eligibility includes Indian citizenship, a suitable roof, and no prior solar subsidies. SBI provides loans with varying amounts and interest rates, tailored to installation capacity.
title: SBI loan for PM Surya Ghar Muft Bijli Yojana: Know eligibility, loan details

description: New infrastructure at Karwar naval base, inaugurated by Navy chief Admiral R Hari Kumar, includes a 350-meter-long pier capable of berthing various warships, providing strategic depth and operational flexibility.
title: New pier inaugurated at strategic Karwar naval base

description: Air India has taken action against a female pilot by suspending her for a duration of three months after she failed the pre-flight breath analyser test, as confirmed by an official. ​​This pilot, serving as a first officer on a Boeing 787 aircraft, reportedly did not pass the test just before she was scheduled to operate a flight from Delhi to Hyderabad. In response to this incident, Air India has grounded her for a period of three months.
title: Air India suspends pilot after failing breathalyser test

description: Mustafa Suleyman, former Google DeepMind co-founder, is now the CEO of Microsoft AI. He launched Inflection AI, joined Microsoft, and announced the opening of Microsoft AI London. The focus is on advancing language models and collaborating with OpenAI.
title: 'As British citizen, I’m...': Mustafa in 1st blog as CEO of Microsoft AI
Paytm Payments Bank's MD, CEO Surinder Chawla resigns

description: Diljit Dosanjh's friend has revealed shocking details about his personal life and said that he is married and has a son. His family lives in the US and the actor is quite protective about his personal life and hence has not spoken about it!
title: Diljit Dosanjh is married & has a son, claims his friend
EC notice to Surjewala for remarks on Hema Malini

description: The recently appointed captain of the Mumbai Indians, Hardik Pandya, seems to be finding contentment in his current role. Despite facing initial backlash from fans for taking over the captaincy from the five-time IPL-winning captain Rohit Sharma, Pandya's demeanor now suggests a sense of satisfaction. However, the team's consecutive losses in the first three games of the season only intensified the scrutiny on Pandya, adding to his challenges as captain.
title: Watch: Hardik Pandya sings 'Hare Krishna, Hare Rama'

description: Dinesh Karthik is one of the rare cricketers who has been present in every IPL season since its inception in 2008. The veteran wicketkeeper-batsman for Royal Challengers Bangalore has hinted that the IPL 2024 might be his last season.
title: 'Unless you are Afridi...': DK's witty dig at former Pak skipper
AAP claims 'political conspiracy'; BJP retorts 'arrogance shattered'

description: The electric motor puts out a massive maximum torque of 24000Nm and is capable of reaching a top speed of 120kmph and is paired with a 300 kWh battery pack and the company claims it can be charged from 10-80 per cent in just 20 minutes.
title: Made in India electric truck: Tresa VO. 2 details

description: The Delhi high court rejected CM Arvind Kejriwal's appeal against the Enforcement Directorate's arrest. Justice Swarana Kanta Sharma upheld the validity of the arrest, stating Kejriwal was involved in the "use and concealment of proceeds of crime." The court dismissed Kejriwal's plea, affirming his alleged conspiracy. Kejriwal was sent to judicial custody in the case on April 1 after he was produced in Delhi's Rouse Avenue court.
title: 'Kejriwal actively involved': What HC said while dismissing plea

description: CSK returned to winning ways on Monday, outclassing the visiting KKR by 7 wickets. The victory was CSK's third of the season and came after back-to-back away defeats. CSK are now at the fourth spot while KKR are placed second with three wins and a loss in four matches.
title: Dhoni's special gift, words of wisdom for Gurbaz

description: Hollywood unions push for AI regulations due to job displacement fears. Over 100,000 jobs at risk by 2026. Executives predict AI disrupting roles. Animation Guild and VFX union seek control over AI. AI benefits filmmakers.
title: 100,000 jobs may be cut: How Hollywood unions are fighting ‘AI threat’

description: Ola decides to exit UK, Australia, NZ for India focus and IPO preparation. The company aims to strengthen its domestic business with electric scooters and bike-taxi services, emphasizing electrification for future growth.
title: Ola quits UK, Australia & New Zealand; here’s what the company said

description: Choosing between old and new tax regimes for TDS on salary in FY 2024-25 requires careful consideration of taxable income estimation, tax liabilities, and potential deductions to maximize take-home pay and minimize tax deductions.
title: TDS on salary: How to choose between new & old tax regime
'America’s global leadership role is being challenged'
'No special privilege for a CM': What HC said on Kejriwal's plea
Malaysia faces new wave of religious outrage

description: Ravindra Jadeja surprised thousands of fans during the IPL match between the Chennai Super Kings and Kolkata Knight Riders on Monday. His match-winning performance and prank added to the excitement, as fans traditionally cheer when middle-order batsmen leave, anticipating the arrival of former captain MS Dhoni.
title: Revealed! Who was the mastermind behind Jadeja-Dhoni prank

description: Arshia Goswami, a young weightlifter from Panchkula, Haryana, wows the internet with her viral videos showcasing her exceptional strength, including a recent 75 kg deadlift that sets a new standard in weightlifting.
title: Believe it or not: Girl, 9, deadlifts 75kg like a pro

description: Ravindra Jadeja, an all-rounder for Chennai Super Kings, set a triple milestone in the Indian Premier League during the match against Kolkata Knight Riders in which he claimed three wickets and took two catches, becoming the first player to achieve at least 100 catches, 1,000 runs, and 100 wickets in the tournament.
title: Jadeja becomes first to achieve this massive IPL milestone

description: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov held a press conference with his Chinese counterpart Wang Yi and said that they initiated a dialogue on Eurasian security to counteract the US alliance's actions. The dialogue aims to enhance security in Eurasia by involving more countries. Yellen warns against bolstering Russia's military capacity.
title: Russia, China to work on ‘double counteracting’ US-led alliance
'China leave!': Philippine protesters trample on Xi's effigy
'My son should not win polls': Cong veteran A K Antony

description: Gold prices hit record highs, driven by global trends, US rate cut expectations, and inflation monitoring. Analysts predict further rise with resistance at Rs 72,650-73,555 and support at Rs 69,200-69,022.
title: Gold rate today: Yellow metal price hits record high

description: During an election rally in Pilibhit on Tuesday, Prime Minister Narendra Modi accused the Congress and the Samajwadi Party of opposing the Citizenship Amendment Act, attributing it to what he termed as the politics of appeasement. He also criticized the INDIA block for not attending the Pran Pratishtha ceremony in Ayodhya earlier this year, alleging disrespect towards Lord Ram.
title: 'If not India, who else will grant citizenship to persecuted minorities': PM

description: A Delhi man recently posted a video on social media alleging that petrol pump employees tampered with machine settings.
title: Man accuses petrol pump staff of manipulating machine settings

description: Google modifies Memegen due to internal conflict over the war in Gaza. Changes include removing the thumbs-down button and popularity metrics, addressing negativity. Tension arises between employees and executives regarding free speech and cultural control.
title: How Israel-Palestine made Google 'change' its employee message board

description: India's local electronics manufacturing is on the rise, with a significant decrease in imports of key components such as mechanics, vibrator motors, charger adapters, and plastic parts. The government's production-linked incentive scheme has boosted local production, leading to a drop in imports of fully assembled electronics like smartphones.
title: Imports of completely boxed smartphones decline by 40%
EC asks CBDT to verify Rajeev Chandrasekhar's poll affidavit details

description: CSIS confirmed Chinese interference in Canadian elections. Erin O'Toole estimated Conservative losses. Trudeau's government criticized for inadequate response. New Democrats raised concerns about invitations from the ethnic Chinese community.
title: 'No role of India': Canada's spy agency reveals Chinese poll meddling

description: Tech professional doubles income to $170,000 by discreetly working 2 jobs, cutting $118,000 student loan. Moonlighting debated in India for white-collar professionals holding 2 jobs simultaneously.
title: How a YouTube video helped a techie earn Rs 1.4 crore via remote job

description: Hardik, who assumed the captaincy of MI in place of Rohit before the current season, is under intense observation for his actions both on and off the field. This scrutiny took an interesting turn following MI's victory over Delhi, as a young enthusiast offered insights and advice, analyzing the game and Hardik's performance akin to an expert, backed by statistics on his fingertips.
title: Strike rate bada, wickets chatka: 'Cute' advice for Hardik

description: The Union government has provided Chief Election Commissioner Rajiv Kumar with a Z-category VIP security cover of armed commandos in view of potential threats, official sources said on Tuesday. The Union Ministry of Home Affairs has entrusted the Central Reserve Police Force with providing a contingent of about 40-45 personnel for the task, the sources said.
title: Centre accords Z-category VIP security cover to CEC Rajiv Kumar

description: Two people, including an Indian-origin Sikh man identified as Buta Singh Gill, were killed in a shooting in Canada's south Edmonton on Monday, as per Canada-based CTV News reports. Edmonton police said, "At approximately 12:00 p.m. today, Monday, Apr. 8, 2024, Southwest Branch patrol officers responded to the report of a shooting in the area of Cavanagh Boulevard SW and Cherniak Way SW."
title: Indian-origin Sikh man among 2 killed in Canada shooting

description: Russia's crude oil imports to India surged to 35% in FY24 from 23% the previous year, surpassing other major suppliers like Iraq, Saudi Arabia, UAE, and the US. Russian supply rose to 1.57 million barrels a day, while Iraq and Saudi Arabia experienced declines. Despite challenges, Indian refiners favor Russian crude for discounts.
title: Russian oil dominates India’s oil imports

description: Bengaluru man's routine cab bookings led to a surprising encounter - the same driver picking him up on Ola and Uber. Shared screenshots sparked internet speculation, praising the driver's dedication in navigating the gig economy.
title: Bengaluru man books trip on Ola and Uber, but gets same driver

description: Jairam Ramesh defends Congress's choice to skip Ram temple event, criticizes BJP for religious politicization. PM Modi led rituals in Ayodhya's Ram temple. Congress leaders declined Chhattisgarh event invitation based on 2019 Supreme Court judgment.
title: 'Vo Ram ke Vyapari hai ... ': Jairam Ramesh’s dig at BJP

description: Elon Musk has acknowledged during a lawsuit deposition that he has made several self-inflicted mistakes, although he maintains he did not "meaningfully harm" to the 22-year-old Jewish man who filed a defamation suit against him. The lawsuit accuses Musk of spreading a false conspiracy theory that labeled the plaintiff as a federal agent disguised as a neo-Nazi.
title: I’m guilty of many self-inflicted wounds: Elon Musk

description: Experience IPL 2024 with 'Willow by Cricbuzz' App in the US. Subscribe for exclusive content, live action, and cashback offers from Abound. Don't miss the electrifying cricket moments and be part of history!
title: IPL 2024 in USA: How to watch IPL live streaming

description: Ruturaj Gaikwad, the young opener for Chennai Super Kings, has been promoted from mentee to the five-time champion team's captain earlier this season. Despite limited discussions on leadership tactics, CSK management subtly prepared Gaikwad, revealing meticulous planning. Gaikwad shared that the conversation was relaxed, with Dhoni providing guidance during practice.
title: How Dhoni, CSK groomed Ruturaj Gaikwad for captaincy

description: Indian summers over the years have made it difficult to survive without an air conditioner. Thus, more and more Indians, especially in the urban areas are investing in good ACs. For those with a budget of Rs. 40,000 and who want to go for a good AC, this article here will be of great help. After a lot of research, we have compiled a list of some of the best options that can withstand rugged usage and are energy efficient. Depending on the area you want to cover and other factors, you can compare and choose the one that best suits your needs.
title: Best AC under 40000: Top picks for quiet and efficient summer comfort

description: HRA claims: The CBDT has clarified that there is no special drive to review mismatched HRA cases, refuting concerns of retrospective taxation. Instances of information mismatch have been identified, prompting the department to notify taxpayers to rectify any discrepancies.
title: HRA claims: I-T dept clarifies no special drive to reopen mismatch cases

description: Opposition Maha Vikas Aghadi in Maharashtra today anounced the seat-sharing arrangement for Maharashtra ahead of Lok Sabha election. After weeks of negotiations, Sharad Pawar, the chief of the Nationalist Congress Party (NCP), Uddhav Thackeray, leader of the Shiv Sena (UBT), and Nana Patole, the president of the state Congress, jointly announced the poll pact for the 48 seats in the state.
title: MVA announces seat-sharing for Maharashtra; Uddhav's Sena gets 21
Delhi court extends BRS leader K Kavitha's custody till April 23

description: Ravindra Jadeja's stellar performance at MA Chidambaram Stadium earned him the 'Cricket Thalapathy' title from CSK.  Jadeja topped the CSK bowling stats with figures of 3 for 18. His contribution played a crucial role in limiting KKR to a below-par score of 137 for 9. Subsequently, CSK comfortably chased down the target for a seven-wicket win.
title: 'Verified': Jadeja christened 'Cricket Thalapathy' by CSK

description: Arun Varnekar, a staunch supporter of PM Modi, chopped off his finger as a sacrifice to Goddess Kali. He believes in Modi's leadership, seeking protection through this act. Varnekar's extreme devotion and faith in 'Modi baba' stand out, reflecting his strong admiration for the Prime Minister.
title: Karnataka man chops off finger for PM Modi's 'third term'

description: Dinesh Karthik, the wicketkeeper-batter for Royal Challengers Bengaluru, impressed in the Indian Premier League 2024 with an unbeaten 28 from just 10 balls and an outstanding strike rate of 280. Former England skipper Nasser Hussain praised Karthik's performance and even tipped him for India's T20 World Cup squad, but Karthik denied his trustworthiness.
title: 'Nas, I am not going to trust a word...': Karthik teases Hussain

description: Chennai Super Kings won a thrilling seven-wicket match against Kolkata Knight Riders in the Indian Premier League, thanks to skipper Ruturaj Gaikwad's stellar batting performance. The team chased down KKR's total with 14 balls to spare, and Dhoni shared a special meeting with KKR mentor Gautam Gambhir after the match.
title: Watch: 'Special reunion' between Dhoni and Gambhir
'Not going to ...': US on reports of targeted killing in Pak

description: Moran and Israel's Ambassador express deep gratitude towards India for unwavering support post-October 7 attack. They praise PM Modi, Indian people's compassion, and India's strong stance against terrorism.
title: ‘Thanks to PM Modi’: Israeli survivor appreciates India's support

description: Eight people, including seven Nepalese nationals, tragically died in a vehicle accident in Nainital district, Uttarakhand. The incident near Betalghat resulted in two injuries. State Disaster Response Team (SDRF) and locals recovered the bodies, providing medical aid to the survivors. The victims were en route to Mahendranagar.
title: 7 Nepal tourists dead after vehicle falls into gorge in Nainital

description: Mixologists in Bengaluru draw inspiration from diverse sources to create unique cocktails. A pollution-themed 'Varthur Overflow' cocktail symbolizes contamination at Varthur Lake. Netizens react to the drink, sparking discussions on city pollution and creativity in the face of environmental challenges.
title: B'luru restaurant adds a splash of lake's 'toxic foam' to drink

description: Ravindra Jadeja's humorous antics delayed MS Dhoni's appearance during the Chennai Super Kings match against Kolkata Knight Riders. After Shivam Dube's wicket fell, Jadeja unexpectedly came out to bat, catching fans and teammates off guard. Despite disappointment, Jadeja's jovial demeanor left the CSK dugout laughing, as he retreated to the pavilion.
title: Watch: Jadeja's playful gesture as Dhoni walks out to a roar

description: Five accused individuals tainted samosas with condoms, gutka, and stones supplied to a leading automobile company in Pimpari Chinchwad, Pune. The perpetrators, including workers and partners, aimed to tarnish the reputation of the newly contracted snack supplier. Police filed a case under IPC sections 328 and 120B for harm and conspiracy.
title: Condoms, gutkha, stones found in samosas supplied to auto firm; 5 booked

description: Novak Djokovic and Rohan Bopanna have become the oldest World No. 1 in ATP Rankings history. Djokovic, aged 36, surpassed Federer to become the oldest World No. 1, while Bopanna leads the ATP Doubles Rankings. They have demonstrated their longevity and resilience, stating that age is merely a number and their passion for the game is enduring.
title: 'Old, but gold!': Djokovic, Bopanna reign as oldest World No. 1s
TN: ED raids multiple places as part of money laundering probe

description: Spain is to axe its so-called "golden visa" scheme under which foreign investors get residency for a 500,000-euro-investment in property, to curb the speculation blighting many Spanish cities, Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez said on Monday. The government is going to "do away with the so-called golden visa scheme that allows access to residency in exchange for investing 500,000 euros in property," Sanchez said while visiting an area near the southern city of Seville.
title: Spain axes 'golden visa' scheme to curb property speculation

description: A 25-year-old Indian student who had been missing since last month was found dead in the US city of Cleveland, the second death within a week as the community grapples with a string of such tragedies. Mohammad Abdul Arfath, hailing from Nacharam, Hyderabad, arrived in the US last year in May to pursue a Masters in IT from Cleveland University.
title: Missing Indian student found dead in US

description: Top loading washing machines are one of the best and most preferred types of washing machines in India. In general, their compact structures, multiple wash programs and price tags (especially compared to the front loading models) usually favour Indian audiences. Understanding this, we have streamlined some of the best top load washing machines in India of different capacities and from different brands to help you in deciding which one to buy.
title: Best top-load washing machines: Perfect picks from top brands

description: The 2024 eclipse united skywatchers in North America, from Mexico to Canada, in awe of the celestial spectacle. Personal stories intertwined with record-setting events, leaving a trail of unity, wonder, and anticipation for future cosmic displays. The eclipse offered a rare visual feast for those under clear skies, presenting the awe-inspiring sight of the moon cloaking the sun, save for a glowing corona.
title: 'I cried a little': Millions enjoy awe and beauty of total solar eclipse

description: An unusual solar eclipse thrilled North America as Nasa's social media accounts showcased the event. 15 states witnessed a total eclipse, while others saw a partial one. Nasa's 'Nasa Moon' humorously 'blocked' the 'Nasa Sun & Space' account on X, gaining three million impressions. Safety precautions and weather effects were highlighted.
title: Nasa's 'Moon' blocks 'Sun' during total solar eclipse 2024

description: No Half Measures By Ruling Cong & BJP In Wooing Crucial OBC Voters | JD(S) Faces Battle Of Survival in 1st Phase Of LS Polls In State
title: Making sense of census, chasing caste and casting votebanks

description: Chennai Super Kings secured a commanding 7-wicket win over Kolkata Knight Riders, led by captain Ruturaj Gaikwad. Gaikwad's unbeaten knock of 67 sealed the victory, evoking nostalgia for MS Dhoni's support during his maiden IPL fifty. He shared that he was similarly nostalgic about his first IPL fifty, where Mahi Bhai was with him and we won the match.
title: 'During my first IPL fifty, Mahi bhai was with me...': Gaikwad

description: Shops in Mumbai face double property tax from May 1 for not displaying Marathi name boards. BMC to cancel licences of non-Marathi signboards. Renewal costs range from Rs 25,000 to Rs 1.5 lakh.
title: Mumbai shops sans Marathi board to pay double property tax

description: A 6-year-old girl was sexually assaulted by an 11-year-old boy in Agra. The survivor's critical condition led to the boy's arrest after confirmation of the assault through a medical examination.
title: Boy, 11, rapes 6-yr-old in Agra, survivor critical

description: Indian Railways 100-day roadmap: Ministries are gearing up to implement various "people-friendly" measures following Prime Minister Narendra Modi's directive to prepare a 100-day plan for the new government. Indian Railways intends to introduce a 24-hour ticket refund scheme, replacing the current three-day process.
title: 24-hour train ticket refund scheme on the cards; top 8 things on 100-day agenda

description: There is a growing legislative momentum against foreign, especially Chinese, ownership of American land mirrors wider geopolitical tensions and domestic political concerns. With a majority of US states either already having such laws or considering them, there's a clear move towards local governance taking action against foreign influence, reflecting worries over the federal government's ability to protect US interests on its own soil.
title: The growing movement against Chinese land ownership in US

description: The Next 50 index is projected to achieve a remarkable 39% earnings growth over the next year, based on Bloomberg's compiled estimates. This expected growth is set to continue the index's impressive 65% rally from the past year, even amidst broader market challenges. Recently, the index celebrated its most successful quarter since 2009, outperforming the larger NSE Nifty 50 Index.
title: Why Nifty Next 50 is emerging as the hottest stock index in India

description: Pratapsinh Gaekwad restores Mumtaz's 1934 navy blue Rolls-Royce, part of the Gaekwad family's imported car collection. The vintage car will return to its original color after 8-10 months of restoration.
title: Once owned by Mumtaz, 1934 Rolls-Royce is back with Gaekwads

description: The main suspect in the murder of Baba Tarsem Singh, Amarjit Singh aka Bittu, was killed in an encounter with the Uttarakhand STF in Haridwar. Amarjit had a reward of Rs 1 lakh on his head and was involved in multiple cases, including the killing of Nanakmatta Gurdwara's 'karseva' chief.
title: Baba Tarsem Singh's murder: Shooter killed in encounter in Haridwar

description: Viacom18's JioCinema targets SMBs with affordable IPL ad rates starting at Rs 25 per thousand impressions, aiming to attract 4,000 advertisers. The platform offers city-level targeting and various budget-friendly packages for creative ad campaigns.
title: IPL 2024: How JioCinema has picked a trick from Facebook & Google

description: Best Buy laid off numerous Geek Squad employees, citing financial constraints. Former employees expressed disappointment over the sudden terminations. The company's strategic shift towards AI and analytics was highlighted amidst growing operational challenges.
title: One of US' biggest gadgets' retailer announces job cuts on phone

description: Ugadi, a cherished Hindu festival celebrated in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, Karnataka, and Maharashtra, marks the beginning of a new lunar year with new beginnings, prosperity, joy, cultural events, traditional rites, and special delicacies like 'Ugadi Pachadi'.
title: Happy Ugadi 2024: Telugu New Year Best messages, images, quotes, wishes, cards, greetings, pictures and GIFs

description: Tesla settled a lawsuit over a 2018 car crash involving Autopilot near San Francisco. The accident killed an Apple engineer. The terms of the settlement were not disclosed. The case raised questions about driver misuse and system understanding.
title: Tesla settles case over fatal Autopilot crash of Apple engineer

description: A prominent figure in the banking industry, Aurangzeb, a former JPMorgan Chase & Co executive, is regarded as highly qualified to tackle the challenges ahead, akin to his predecessors. Despite his readiness, several external factors contribute to the complexity of his role. These include the instability of domestic politics, strained relations with neighboring countries such as India, Afghanistan, and Iran.
title: Muhammad Aurangzeb: From JPMorgan to Pak's fin min with no pay

description: Donald Trump's request to delay his April 15 criminal trial, related to hush money for a porn star, in Manhattan, was denied by a New York appellate judge. The trial involves 34 counts of falsifying business records.
title: Trump loses last-ditch bid to delay hush money trial

description: Israel for the first time deployed its ship-mounted defence system, called the C-Dome, against a "suspicious" target that entered the country's airspace near the southern city of Eilat, the military said Tuesday. "Following the sirens that sounded in the area of Eilat regarding the infiltration of a hostile aircraft, IDF Naval forces identified a suspicious aerial target crossing into Israeli territory," the IDF said in a statement released early Tuesday.
title: Israel deploys C-Dome defence system for the first time

description: Chaitra Navratri, celebrating Goddess Durga with devotion and fasting, marks the Hindu New Year onset. Devotees worship the nine Navadurga forms, seeking blessings, spiritual growth, and protection during the auspicious nine-day festival.
title: 75+ Happy Chaitra Navratri mantras, quotes for 2024
